          class IntegralGraph implements the Graph interface.
 class JDXSpectrum

          Returns the Spectrum at the specified index

          Constructs a new JSVPanel

          Constructs a JSVPanel with an array of spectra and corresponding start and end indices of data points that should be displayed
JSVPanel(Graph spectrum, int startIndex, int endIndex)
          Constructs a JSVPanel with a single Spectrum the segment specified by startindex and endindex displayed
